name: info-bets
tag_list: bookmakers, bet, betting, sports, league, play-lottery, pools, win-betting, live, online, motorsports, golf, football, soccer, events, world-cup, hockey, cricket, politics, rugby, cup, money, tennis, formula-1, entertainment, racing, players, fun, basketb
overview:
The latest information on sports betting. Comparisons, results, tables, statistics and news.

  • The most important bookmakers, their bonuses and current odds.
  • Results of previous rounds and seasons, and live scores in football, basketball, tennis, ice hockey, baseball and american football.
  • Tables of the main leagues in the named sports.
  • Statistics such as head to head, tendencies, over/under, season, etc.
  • Sports news in real time.
  • Odds comparisons (match, winner, over/under, handicaps) from multiple bookmakers in hundreds of events.

In addition to exclusive services for registered users:

  • Alerts of odds, valuebets and surebets.
  • Favorites: teams, tournaments, sports, bookmakers.
  • Sports betting forum.

And all absolutely free.
